Organization Name: HOPE WOMENS SHELTER | WOMENS SHELTER | DOMESTIC ABUSE SERVICES
Description: Provides a safe haven for women, men, children, and families in situations of domestic abuse. Services provided include counseling for violence and sexual abuse in an individual session or in peer support groups, legal advocacy, resource assistance, transportation to medical resource assistance programs, food, clothing and case management. Anyone in a domestic violence situation may access services - shelter residency is not required.

Organization Name: JOHNSON COUNTY FAMILY CRISIS CENTER | CRISIS CENTER | DOMESTIC VIOLENCE AND SEXUAL ASSAULT SERVICES
Description: Provides shelter, counseling and support groups for primary and secondary victims of family violence and/or sexual assault.

Organization Name: WISE HOPE SHELTER AND CRISIS CENTER | JACK COUNTY SITE | OUTREACH CENTER
Description: Provide a shelter, 24-hour hotline, and accompaniment services to survivors of domestic or sexual assault.

Organization Name: WISE HOPE SHELTER AND CRISIS CENTER | MONTAGUE COUNTY SITE | OUTREACH CENTER
Description: Provide a shelter, 24-hour hotline, and accompaniment services to survivors of domestic or sexual assault.

Organization Name: WISE HOPE SHELTER AND CRISIS CENTER | WISE COUNTY SITE | OUTREACH CENTER
Description: Provide a shelter, 24-hour hotline, and accompaniment services to survivors of domestic or sexual assault.

Organization Name: SAFEHAVEN OF TARRANT COUNTY | ARLINGTON RESOURCE CENTER | DOMESTIC VIOLENCE HOTLINE
MISSION GRANBURY | RESOURCE CENTER | NON-RESIDENTIAL VICTIM'S SERVICES
Description: Provides assessment and assistance to individuals and families who are victims of crime, including sexual assault and family violence. Provides a 24 hour crisis intervention hotline; advocacy, safe shelter, and counseling for women and children who are victims of domestic violence.

Organization Name: MUSLIM COMMUNITY CENTER FOR HUMAN SERVICES | MAIN OFFICE | SOCIAL SERVICES
Description: Provides a crisis hotline 24 hours 7 days for counseling, referral, case management, and access to services for victims of domestic violence in the community but also specifically for Southwest Asian, Middle Eastern, and African immigrant communities.

Organization Name: CROSS TIMBERS FAMILY SERVICES | STEPHENVILLE SITE | VICTIM SERVICES
Description: Provide crisis intervention, prevention, awareness education, and advocacy services for victims of family violence, sexual assault, child abuse, and other crimes. Services provided include a 24-hour hotline, 24-hour victim assistance and rape crisis counseling, referrals to shelter for family violence victims, counseling and advocacy, including monthly legal clinics, support groups, crime victims compensation assistance, information and referral and community education.
